transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001127593.1 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000436743.5. The two transcripts differ at the 3'UTR.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000367967.7. The two transcripts differ at the 5' and 3'UTRs.
